about_the_game: Nyanco Viewer Plus is a special, donation-based DLC created to support Nyanco on Steam. Essentially, this DLC mirrors the free version of the base app, offering the same core experiences. It's important to note that purchasing this DLC isn't mandatory to access these potential updates. Nyanco Viewer Plus offers a unique way to support Nyanco, with exclusive artwork as a thank-you, while ensuring core updates remain accessible to all. Your support and love for Nyanco-chan mean the world to us!

content_descriptors.notes: Nyanco Viewer itself does not host mature content. However, due to the app's capability as an image viewer, users have the ability to upload their images directly into Nyanco Viewer. By using Nyanco Viewer, users are thereby acknowledged to have accepted Steam's Rules and Guidelines. Specifically, when sharing screenshots with the Steam Community, we respectfully request that users diligently review and adhere to Steam's Online Conduct.

Essentially, this DLC mirrors the free version of the base app, offering the same core experiences. It's important to note that purchasing this DLC isn't mandatory to access these potential updates. Nyanco Viewer Plus offers a unique way to support Nyanco, with exclusive artwork as a thank-you, while ensuring core updates remain accessible to all. Your support and love for Nyanco-chan mean the world to us!
name: Nyanco Viewer Plus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
